eventhorizon.configuration.title: Event Horizon Settings
eventhorizon.configuration.enableMod.too: Enables the timer and random events.
eventhorizon.configuration.timerDuration: Time until a random event occurs (in seconds)
eventhorizon.configuration.eventSound.to: Plays a sound notification when a new event activates.
eventhorizon.configuration.countdownSoun: Plays a sound notification during the countdown to a new event.
eventhorizon.configuration.durationMulti: This event's duration equals the timer duration multiplied by this event's duration multiplier.
eventhorizon.commands.clear.all: All active events have been cleared
eventhorizon.commands.info.name: Name:
eventhorizon.message.ready: [Event Horizon] Game is paused. Type %s to continue
eventhorizon.configuration.dropChallenge: Survive a fall from height using any available method.
eventhorizon.configuration.happyBirthday:
The player suddenly remembered it's their birthday today.
Did you prepare a gift?
eventhorizon.configuration.adventureMode: You cannot place or break blocks.
eventhorizon.configuration.cuteFont.tool: Makes your text super duper cute.
eventhorizon.configuration.x5Timer.toolt: Events occur five times as frequently.
eventhorizon.configuration.x2EventTime.t: Doubles the duration of future events.
eventhorizon.configuration.inventoryShuf: Opening the inventory will cause it to be shuffled.
eventhorizon.configuration.wideMining.to:
Tools mine a 3x3 area.
Crouch to mine normally.
eventhorizon.configuration.dementia.tool: Do you remember well where your items are?
eventhorizon.configuration.timeStop.tool:
Time is frozen for everything except you.
ZA WARUDO!
eventhorizon.configuration.randomStructu: A random vanilla structure appears nearby.
Contact with living organic blocks deals damage.
Don't touch the grass!
All blocks act like magma.
Crouch!
eventhorizon.configuration.noJump.toolti: Your character cannot jump at all.
eventhorizon.configuration.enderBlood.to:
Taking damage and making eye contact causes teleportation.
Don't touch the water!
eventhorizon.configuration.lowGravity.to:
Gravity is reduced.
You can jump a bit higher and don't fear falls.
eventhorizon.configuration.noGravity.too:
You float helplessly.
It's unpleasant to hang in the air, isn't it?
eventhorizon.configuration.creativeFly.t: Grants the ability to fly like in Creative mode.
eventhorizon.configuration.keepInventory:
You keep your items when you die.
You can return to the respawn point.
eventhorizon.configuration.photosensitiz:
Bright light causes burning.
Don't go outside!
Replaces entities with random ones.
Lucky if there's no Warden or Wither nearby.
eventhorizon.configuration.babyMobs.tool:
Mobs become babies.
Oh no... Children...
eventhorizon.configuration.noInventory.t:
You cannot open your inventory.
You can still access it through workstations.
eventhorizon.configuration.muted.tooltip:
All game sounds are disabled.
Enjoy the silence.
eventhorizon.configuration.archeologyPlu:
Clear sand, gravel and soul sand with a brush.
There's something interesting inside.
eventhorizon.configuration.onlyNegativeE:
Only negative events will be selected.
Pray.
eventhorizon.configuration.onlyPositiveE:
Only positive events will be selected.
You're in luck!
eventhorizon.configuration.meteorRain.to:
Meteors fall from the sky, causing destruction.
Time to dig in.
eventhorizon.configuration.deadlyFalls.t:
Fall damage leads to death.
Think ten times before jumping anywhere.
eventhorizon.configuration.changeDimensi:
Teleports you to another dimension.
No, it cannot teleport you to the End.
eventhorizon.configuration.unknown.toolt: You remember the distinctive features of events well, don't you?
Enables smooth, cinematic camera movements.
It's similar to Optifine.
eventhorizon.configuration.whereMobs.too:
Where are the mobs?
All mobs become invisible and silent.
eventhorizon.configuration.fluidWalker.t: Allows you to walk on water and lava as if on solid ground.
eventhorizon.configuration.oldWalking.to: Restores the old animation, forces players to inevitably jump forward.
eventhorizon.configuration.allItemsAreTo: Any item allows you to avoid death.
eventhorizon.configuration.allItemsAreEd:
Hurray! You can eat dirt!
All items in your inventory become edible, but you're plagued by hunger.
eventhorizon.configuration.nyctophobia.t:
Light is your best friend.
Darkness deals damage.
eventhorizon.configuration.fullBrightnes:
Allows you to see everything in the dark.
Turn off cheats.
eventhorizon.configuration.lowRenderDist:
Significantly reduces render distance.
That's how all the horror stories about Herobrine begin.
eventhorizon.configuration.equipmentUpgr: Upgrades all currently equipped items to the next tier.
eventhorizon.configuration.equipmentDown: Downgrades all currently equipped items to the previous tier.
eventhorizon.configuration.enchantHoneyB:
Can remove negative events.
Additional bottles can be obtained from hives during the event.
eventhorizon.configuration.returnToLastD: Teleports you back to the location of your last death.
eventhorizon.configuration.cursedVault.t:
A mysterious vault.
There's something useful and even interesting inside...
eventhorizon.configuration.onlySwimmingP:
You can only crawl.
You're like a fish :)
eventhorizon.configuration.noTransparenc:
Makes all transparent blocks opaque.
My eyes!
eventhorizon.configuration.damageBringsT:
Any damage causes an explosion.
Be more careful.
eventhorizon.configuration.deleteChunk.t:
Deletes the area around you.
Who's playing around with WorldEdit?
Plays random sounds.
This is a masterpiece.
eventhorizon.configuration.shakyCrosshai:
Makes the crosshair shake.
Where is it trying to run away to?
eventhorizon.configuration.petCarrier.to:
Portable ender chest.
This cat is your main friend in this chaos.
eventhorizon.configuration.forceNarrator:
Forces the narrator to read all chat messages and some UI elements.
Shut up!
eventhorizon.configuration.bonemealer.to:
You leave a trail of bone meal behind you.
A garden bed as a gift.
eventhorizon.configuration.smallGUI.tool:
Makes the graphical interface very small.
How can anyone play with this?
eventhorizon.configuration.spicedFood.to:
Makes all your food more filling.
Simply finger-licking good!
eventhorizon.configuration.huntingSeason: Catch as many precious critters as possible.
eventhorizon.configuration.flyingFish.to:
You can swim through the air.
However you suffocate outside of water.
eventhorizon.configuration.returnToLastD: You haven't died yet â€” congratulations!
item.eventhorizon.enchanted_honey_bottle: Removes a random negative event for the entire server
death.attack.eventhorizon.botanophobia.p: %1$s died because of grass... and it's all %2$s's fault!
death.attack.eventhorizon.botanophobia.i: %1$s died because of grass that %2$s shoved them into with %3$s!
death.attack.eventhorizon.nyctophobia.pl: %1$s thought hiding in the dark from %2$s was a good idea
death.attack.eventhorizon.nyctophobia.it: %1$s chose to vanish into darkness rather than fight %2$s and their %3$s!
